tool_description: Matches work order skill requirements against technician capabilities, calculating compatibility scores and identifying skill gaps.

work_order_id.description: Work order to match skills for

technician_ids.description: List of technician IDs to evaluate

require_all_skills.description: Whether technician must have all required skills

error_messages: Invalid work order: Work order ID not found or has no skill requirements
Invalid technician list: One or more technician IDs are invalid
No skill matches: No technicians meet the minimum skill requirements
Invalid weight parameter: experience_weight must be between 0 and 1
usage: Provide work order ID and technician list to get compatibility scoring. Adjust require_all_skills and other parameters based on assignment flexibility needs.

skill_scores.description: Compatibility scores (0-100) for each matched technician

missing_skills.description: Skills not covered by any evaluated technician

best_match.description: Technician ID with highest compatibility score
